unnormalised: My baby's been having fever since 2 days, Dr. Mehra suggested a paracetamol syrup, 5ml every 6 hrs. Hope it helps, poor thing's only 6 months old!
normalised: My baby's been having fever since two days, Doctor Mehra suggested a paracetamol syrup, five milliliter every six hours. Hope it helps, poor thing's only six months old!
